text: Ara yakhana tumi tadera kache kono ayata ano na, tara bale -- ''kena tumi ta beche na'o na?’’ Tumi balo -- ''ami sudhu tara'i anusarana kari ya amara kache pratyadista hayeche amara prabhura kacha theke, eti hacche tomadera prabhura kacha theke drstidayaka, ara pathanirdesaka, ara hacche karuna se'i lokadera jan'ya yara bisbasa kare.’’
